entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with an agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit! My name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes and some tires I recently purchased.
Okay, I can definitely help you with that. Can I get your order number, please?
Thanks! I see the order here. Just to clarify, have the shoes or tires been, by any chance, been *mounted* or used?
Yes, I *installed* the tires and I wore the shoes on a couple of rides to test them out.

Okay, I understand. Unfortunately, because the shoes have *cleat marks* and the tires are used with *dirty tires*, we *cannot resell* them as new. Our return policy states that items must be returned in new and unused condition. Since you already *mounted* the tires and used the shoes, we're unable to process a return in this case.
Oh, I see. I didn't realize that. So, there's nothing you can do?
Regrettably, that's correct in this situation. However, I can offer you a 15% discount on your next purchase with us. Would that be of interest?
Yes, that would be great, thank you!
Perfect! I've applied a 15% discount code to your account. It will automatically be applied at checkout on your next order. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help!
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
